programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Gigantes - Lendas do sumo do Hawaii
programme.desc: Acompanhamos as vidas épicas das lendas do sumo que transcenderam as suas origens humildes no Havai para se tornarem nos primeiros estrangeiros a ascender aos patamares mais elevados do sumo.

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Barcelona: Surf Destination
programme.desc: Em "Barcelona: Surf Destination", Ítalo Ferreira, o primeiro campeão olímpico de surf, aceita o convite do seu amigo Alex Vilalta e viaja para Barcelona para explorar a costa catalã e conhecer a comunidade de surfistas que mantém o espírito do surf aceso neste reduto mediterrâneo. Neste documentário de aventuras repletas de sol, somos convidados a partir numas férias com amigos que se reúnem para tagarelar e entregar-se àquilo que os apaixona: o surf.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: Rumeysa: De cabeça erguida
programme.desc: Com 2,15 m de altura, a impressionante estatura de Rumeysa Gelgi é apenas comparável à sua assombrosa força interior. Rumeysa Gelgi nasceu com uma mutação genética rara, a síndrome de Weaver. E a vida não tem sido fácil para a mulher mais alta do mundo. Agora, graças a uma cirurgia que lhe mudou a vida, está pronta a viajar pela primeira vez aos EUA para conhecer algumas das mulheres mais inspiradoras do mundo. Na sua viagem de autodescoberta, Rumeysa contará a sua história e aprenderá junto com outras mulheres que detêm recordes do Livro Guiness.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.desc: We reconfigure our racy 427 LSX from naturally aspirated to supercharged status to make big boosted horsepower!

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey in Serbia, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia
programme.desc: Natural Living Massage, one of the signature treatments at the Fusion Maia all-inclusive spa resort in Da Nang, Vietnam, is a combination of eastern healing and aromatherapy. Jamie Srubis tries this along with other treatments such as a lymphatic warm bamboo massage, which is good for detoxing, and Mindful Energy, a spa treatment that combines reiki with a head massage session.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Charlie introduces the indigenous handicrafts of Oaxaca, including the whimsical creatures with a unique story.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: From the land of the hallowed Camp Nou stadium to the Catalan capital boasting amazing seafood, Barcelona is a city with many shades to it.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner, India
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Mexico La Baja
programme.desc: Charlie’s journey across Mexico begins in La Paz, a quiet escape sitting on the Sea of Cortez that is often overshadowed by Cabo.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments built during the Roman, Hungarian and Turkish era.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence
programme.desc: Frieshia spürt den Zauber von Mauritius durch die einzigartige Mischung aus Moderne und Tradition, die das Luxusresort bietet.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: While checking out the art scene of Madrid and enjoying the liveliness at a local market, Alex is engulfed by the energy of this young European city.

programme.desc: From dolphin-filled lagoons to colonial charm, Charlie introduces the treasures of the least visited state on the Yucatan peninsula, Campeche.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: People flock to Cabo for those perfect beach vacations. Charlie, however, knows a different side to the destination: the action-packed side.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Barcelona was the canvas of the world-renowned architect, Antoni Gaudi, who branded the city with his fantastical creations.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life doesn’t seem to have changed much since the 15th century. On one hand, she gets a taste of luxury at what was once the hunting manor of the royals of Jodhpur, and on the other hand, she loses her heart to the simple ways of life led by the residents of the villages nearby. The highlight of her trip, however, is a surprise that awaits her at an ancient stepwell.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia. Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Backpack Resavska Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Tulum, one of the last cities built and inhabited by the Mayans; Charlie narrates the stories about their reign.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 XP Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo is the oldest of the Scandinavian capitals; with a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, the city’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors. Elisha goes on a tour to see some of them such as the magnificent Arkeshus Castle, a medieval castle that was built to protect Oslo but was used instead as a prison, and Oslo City Hall, the administrative center of the city which hosts the annual Nobel peace prize ceremony.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 XP Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: Perhaps the most famous period in Norwegian history was the Viking Age. Far from just barbaric, axe-wielding invaders, the Vikings were Norse seafarers who left a major impact on European history through trade, colonization, and far-flung exploration. During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed Viking ships at a museum, where she comes to know fascinating stories about the lives led by the Vikings.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Secret diving spots, under-the-radar lagoons, ancient Mayan ruins – there is a lot more to the Yucatan peninsula than Cancun and Playa del Carmen.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis, one of the oldest cities in Europe. Here, she visits a concentration camp built in World War II and later enjoys paragliding wrapping up by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 XP Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo is the oldest of the Scandinavian capitals; with a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, the city’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors. Elisha goes on a tour to see some of them such as the magnificent Arkeshus Castle, a medieval castle that was built to protect Oslo but was used instead as a prison, and Oslo City Hall, the administrative center of the city which hosts the annual Nobel peace prize ceremony.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Backpack Resavska Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Tulum, one of the last cities built and inhabited by the Mayans; Charlie narrates the stories about their reign.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey in Serbia, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries the locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and the beautiful Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 World Spas Fusion Maia
programme.desc: Natural Living Massage, one of the signature treatments at the Fusion Maia all-inclusive spa resort in Da Nang, Vietnam, is a combination of eastern healing and aromatherapy. Jamie Srubis tries this along with other treatments such as a lymphatic warm bamboo massage, which is good for detoxing, and Mindful Energy, a spa treatment that combines reiki with a head massage session.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Charlie introduces the indigenous handicrafts of Oaxaca, including the whimsical creatures with a unique story.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 XP Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: Perhaps the most famous period in Norwegian history was the Viking Age. Far from just barbaric, axe-wielding invaders, the Vikings were Norse seafarers who left a major impact on European history through trade, colonization, and far-flung exploration. During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed Viking ships at a museum, where she comes to know fascinating stories about the lives led by the Vikings.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: From the land of the hallowed Camp Nou stadium to the Catalan capital boasting amazing seafood, Barcelona is a city with many shades to it.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments built during the Roman, Hungarian and Turkish era.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Viajar Mexico La Baja
programme.desc: Charlie’s journey across Mexico begins in La Paz, a quiet escape sitting on the Sea of Cortez that is often overshadowed by Cabo.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 City Breaks Bikaner, India
programme.desc: Bikaner is known to most people as the city of world-famous savoury snacks. When Asmita goes there for a whirlwind trip, however, she discovers that there is a lot more to Rajasthan’s Red City than meets the eye. From the miniature paintings that can be found on the walls of palaces and mansions across the city to the elaborate architecture of the former havelis of merchants, she finds out that Bikaner is an art lover’s paradise.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Barcelona was the canvas of the world-renowned architect, Antoni Gaudi, who branded the city with his fantastical creations.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: People flock to Cabo for those perfect beach vacations. Charlie, however, knows a different side to the destination: the action-packed side.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia. Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Narlai & Jawai, India
programme.desc: The need for a short, refreshing break leads Asmita to a quaint hamlet in Rajasthan, where life doesn’t seem to have changed much since the 15th century. On one hand, she gets a taste of luxury at what was once the hunting manor of the royals of Jodhpur, and on the other hand, she loses her heart to the simple ways of life led by the residents of the villages nearby. The highlight of her trip, however, is a surprise that awaits her at an ancient stepwell.

programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option; the Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people; when it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow; in 2016, Mercedes-Benz introduced their Generation EQ and Volkswagen announced the making of 20 new electrified models by 2020.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.desc: Every year 150,000 petrol heads travel to the Nevada dessert to attend the SEMA in Las Vegas, the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. Among them is motoring journalist Kati. She meets with tuning expert Dirk Hattenh.

programme.desc: The SEMA Show in Las Vegas is the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. From complexly rebuilt show cars to giant off-road monster trucks: Anything is represented here.

programme.desc: Filmed over two years and narrated by Rob Warner, Shires is a bicycle film encompassing everything that makes UK riding great – the riders, trails, landscapes and the volatile weather of the British isles.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: 23-year-old Jorge Prado stands atop European motocross as reigning MXGP World Champion. Now he's chasing a lifelong dream and testing himself by racing Supercross under the bright lights in America.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: French duo Tancrède Melet and Julien Millot are masters of highlining. Untethered and thousands of metres above sea level, they BASE jump into the void, synthesizing a new sport they call BASE Lining.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Riders on the storm
programme.desc: Using sophisticated technology to hunt fearsome storms that create monster-sized swells, veteran surfers Ross Clarke-Jones and Tom Carroll set off for the unridden waves of Pedra Branca.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: A freak swell that creates a towering wave in Tahiti and a rare rolling cloud that looms dangerously in the skies above Australia are irresistible lures for athletes to confront these natural wonders.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Tapping into the "flow," a meditative state in which an athlete becomes one with his surroundings, Ben Brown battles life-threatening weather to lead a kayaking expedition across New Zealand.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Venturing to ascend the impressive Cerro Autana, climbers Leo Houlding, Jason Pickles and Sean Leary trek deep into the Amazon to discover why this summit has never been reached from the east.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: At least 16 expeditions have tried to summit the 8,000m peak called Gasherbrum II during the Pakistani winter. They all failed. Determined to beat the stats, Cory Richards documents his team's ascent.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: In their quest to be the first to summit Ulvetanna Peak in Antarctica, Leo Houlding, Jason Pickles and Sean Leary will need good weather and all their experience to best a frozen 2,931m challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Darren Berrecloth leads a group of mountain bikers through the hostile terrain of Nepal's Upper Mustang and China's Gobi Desert, carrying their bikes to reach the world's most breathtaking descents.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Ice climber Harald Berger waits for one of Austria's most stunning waterfalls to freeze over. The Supervisor is a thousand-foot cascade of ice that he’s determined to conquer in a free solo ascent.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: In the Isterdalen Valley of Norway, BASE jumping enthusiasts Shane McConky, JT Holmes and Miles Daisher climb into state-of-the-art wingsuits to learn the art of proximity jumping from the best.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit für die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten über und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhälfte. Let's check out!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: Für die Strecke von Ruhpolding (GER) nach Kasern (ITA), 210 Kilometer und mehr als 10000 Höhenmeter, benötigen Freizeitsportler etwa fünf bis sieben Tage. Benedikt Böhm strebt die magische Zeitgrenze von 36 Stunden nonstop an.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kitesurf World Tour
programme.desc: Autumn is coming and it's time to get comfortable on the couch. But not for the kite-surf Athletes. The GKA 2022 has its next stop in Dakhla, Morroco and the surfers show their skill on the windy sea

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (OK/OKJ)
programme.desc: After three consecutive Finals in wet conditions between 2019 and 2021, the Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Champion-ship - OK & OK-Junior saw good weather and high temperatures for the season over the weekend.

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 1
programme.desc: Today we ask you to put on your seatbelts and join us for the saison opener of the Penrite Australian V8 Superboats Championship 2022 in Cabarita, Australia.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Big Air Team Challenge
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge besuchen wir die aufregenden Winterspiele 2023 mit der Big Air Team Challenge! Seien Sie dabei, wenn die Freestyle-Skifahrer und Snowboarder ihr Können auf spektakuläre Weise unter Beweis stellen!

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2022 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: The second event of the GKA Freestyle World Cup season will see the world’s best freestyle kiters re-start their campaigns towards the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Championship title that culminates in Brazil next month.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals 2022
programme.desc: In today’s Episode we´ll give you the full dose of Freestyle Snowboarding and Skiing. Young talented Athletes from all over the world can demonstrate their skills during the World Rookie Tour 2022.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #01
programme.desc: The North Face Frontier 4* show is a kiwi freeride institution at the iconic Remarkables Ski Area in Queenstown. It runs in a weather window between Saturday 3rd and Thursday 8th September and is a big mountain freeride competition.

programme.title: Beach Wrestling World Series Finals 2022
programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: "Go big or go home!" – four athletes in search of the perfect wave. Their quest takes them from Africa to North America. In order to push their sport to its limits!

programme.title: Island Durchquerung
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to be the first mountain bikers to do a real North to South traverse of Iceland, one of the largest volcanic island in the world. They choose the month of August for their adventure.

programme.title: Roopkund - Der geheimnisvolle See
programme.desc: Following the adventure mountain biker Hans Rey and his team to the Indian Himalayas. Their goal: reach the mysterious Roopkund Lake, a glacial lake in the Uttarakhand region!

programme.title: Cape Pioneer Finals - MTB Stage Race - Oudtshoorn (RSA)
programme.desc: Mossel Bay on the East Cape coast plays host to the race for the first three nights.

programme.title: GlemmRide 2019 - MTB Slopestyle - Saalbach Hinterglemm (AUT)
programme.desc: For the fifth consecutive year, Saalbach Hinterglemm invites to a festive bike gathering: Between July 3rd and 7th 2019, the bike Eldorado will again host the GlemmRide Bike Festival.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: Between Home

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: Gasherbrum II - Expedition
programme.desc: It was one of the last blank spots on the map of alpinism: the winter ascent of an eight-thousander at Pakistan’s Karakoram mountains.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: Sickline - Die Dokumentation
programme.desc: 150 of the world’s best whitewater kayakers from numerous countries meet to determine the Sickline Extreme Kayak World Champion on the legen-dary “Wellerbrücke“ rapids.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: Engadin Snow
programme.desc: The ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is widely known as an extraordinary freeride event in front of a backdrop with the fascinating snowy mountain tops of the Swiss Canton of Grisons. This unique parallel freeride format pairs two riders in a team.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap UpIn This weeks episode we take a look at the season wrap up of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Let´s check out Europes best wavesailors, competing at the bests spots on the Contoinent

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 - Season Recap
programme.desc: An epic season of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022 has come to an end and we take a look back at the highlights of the tour. So enjoy the water-Action of some of the best freestyle windsurfers of the world.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Profile - Aurelien Routens (Freeride Snowboard)
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France is a free-spirited, adventurous snowboarder who has excelled in competition and exploration, having numerous first descents to his name. He was runner-up in the 2013 Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Skitouren Dokumentation
programme.desc: Weiße Gipfel, einsame Hänge und unberührte Natur: Skibergsteigen ist der größte alpine Trend und die wohl am schnellsten wachsende Bergsportart.

programme.title: adidas INFINITE TRAILS 2019 - Gastein (AUT)
programme.desc: More than 600 trailrunners from all over the world face this innovative format of the adidas INFINITE TRAILS World Championships 2019: Relays of 3 people cross altogether more than 126 kilometres and 7,300 vertical metres.

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar - Castellón (Spain).

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Profile - Nadine Wallner (Freeride Ski)

Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.
